description:
A reporter for a weekly magazine appears before Ringo, claiming he wants to interview the families of those affected by the incident. He also comes out with the fact that the siblings of the Takakura household are in fact not related by blood at all.
The same reporter, then finds his way to Himari. He asks about where the money used to afford her expensive medicine is coming from, which leads Himari to trail Kamba late at night to a certain secret location...
Source: Official Site

titles.title: Bokutachi ga Erabu Unmei no Door
La porta del destino che scegliamo
La porte du destin que nous choisissons
The Door of Fate We Choose
僕たちが選ぶ運命のドア
